name: Toasts With Gianduja, Ricotta and Dulce de Leche
recipeIngredient: Fleur de sel or coarse sea salt

recipeInstructions.text: Spread each toast with 1 teaspoon of the gianduja. (If you cannot find gianduja, melt 10 teaspoons semisweet chocolate over a double boiler and stir in 2 teaspoons hazelnut or almond paste.) Top with 1 tablespoon of the ricotta and drizzle with dulce de leche. Sprinkle with a pinch of fleur de sel.
